about.description: I’m a 21-year old systems and computing engineer (Computer Science) with knowledge in enterprise management, enthusiastic with deep learning and data science. Currently living in Eindhoven, Netherlands but I'm a Colombian guy who really enjoy learning new things, the good food, family & friends, travel and having fun. Love my family, coding, coffee and sports. I also make part of the university Squash Team and have been training for more than 10 years. If you liked what you have read so far, don't hesitate in reading this awesome page, my linkedIn profile and contact me as well.

workExperience.description: Minor in the Master of Computer Science & Mathematics. Data Science track. QS Ranking: 102
BSc. Systems & Computing Engineering (Computer Science). QS Ranking: 234
Worked as software developer in business process simulation with Deep Learning. PhD project. Code LSTM/RNN algorithm that learn and predict inter-arrival times based on business process log.
Worked as assistant towards a PhD project that involves Tensor Flow, deep learning and repository data mining.
ML Techniques, Performance and Applicability course. International Summer School
Coursera Deep Learning Specialization. Foundations of DL: NN, DNN, Hyperparameters, Optimization, CNN, Sequence Models
Blockchain principles and practices and how they can be applied within a business environment. Distributed ledger systems, how assets can be transferred in a Blockchain network.

Develop workshops, grade, give feedback and support to students in the following courses: Business Processes Governance, Data Structures, Algorithms and Object-oriented programming and Intro to Systems Engineering.

projects.name: Deep Learning Projects
projects.description: Models for high dimensional data such as natural text, images, and audio. Centered in the study of how to use these models and representations in classification, retrieval, and recommendations.

projects.name: Easy Bus
projects.description: Mobile Application for iOS and Android with Analytics Engine. Developed using Design Thinking. Help citizen to plan, manage and follow their trip in real time using public transport, taxi and Uber.

projects.name: Activity Wall
projects.description: Easy to use application that provides a customizable wall to follow events on twitter and instagram. The application also provides visualizations than enable the analysis of user interactions.
projects.technologies: JavaScript, React Js, Meteor, Mongo DB, D3, HTML+CSS

projects.name: Event - Organizer
projects.description: Web Application aimed at facilitating the planning process of any kind of event. With the app you can share your events, include all the necessary items in a checklist, make comments, and more.

projects.name: BikeLab
projects.description: Online Marketplace for Bike Lovers. Project for CS Web Development 2018.
projects.technologies: React JS, Mongo DB, Node JS, Heroku, HTML, CSS

projects.name: Digit Recognizer
projects.description: Application aimed to explain Tensorflow js, canvas and D3. MNIST Digit recognizer app. This app was made with educational purpose and for entertain. Tutorial Video in the repo.

projects.name: Colmines
projects.description: IoT application aimed at preventing health issues and increasing productivity in mines by monitoring different environmental variables and activating control systems as necessary.
projects.technologies: Python, Django, Auth0, Kafka, ZooKeeper, Mosquitto, Node-red, Cassandra, Arduino.

hobbies.name: Family
hobbies.caption: The most grateful thing in life is to spend quality time in family.
